ISSUE.TITLE: View for only activated repos
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The list of repos in the main view of drone can get very long, and it's difficult to tell which are actually active. This is a suggestion to split the repo screen into 2 - one that shows only activated projects and one that shows you all where you can choose to activate any of them.
